name: tokenized-ai-agent
description: Token-gated AI agent using Oasis ROFL. This repo connects an ERC-20 token to off-chain logic execution via a secure enclave (TDX), enabling trusted AI inference and verifiable on-chain payments.

scripts.deploy:localnet: ENV_FILE=.env.localnet npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network sapphire-localnet
scripts.deploy:testnet: ENV_FILE=.env.testnet npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network sapphire-testnet
scripts.deploy:mainnet: ENV_FILE=.env.mainnet npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network sapphire
scripts.deploy:base-testnet: ENV_FILE=.env.base-testnet npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network baseSepolia
scripts.deploy:base-mainnet: ENV_FILE=.env.base-mainnet npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network base
scripts.rofl:create:testnet: oasis rofl create --network testnet --deployment testnet --account oasis_testnet
scripts.rofl:build:testnet: cp compose.testnet.yaml compose.yaml && docker run --platform linux/amd64 --volume "$(pwd)":/src --volume ~/.docker:/root/.docker:ro -it ghcr.io/oasisprotocol/rofl-dev:main oasis rofl build --deployment testnet
scripts.rofl:update:testnet: npm run rofl:set:testnet && oasis rofl update --deployment testnet
scripts.rofl:create:base-testnet: oasis rofl create --network testnet --deployment base-testnet --account oasis_testnet
scripts.rofl:build:base-testnet: cp compose.base-testnet.yaml compose.yaml && docker run --platform linux/amd64 --volume "$(pwd)":/src --volume ~/.docker:/root/.docker:ro -it ghcr.io/oasisprotocol/rofl-dev:main oasis rofl build --deployment base-testnet
scripts.rofl:update:base-testnet: npm run rofl:set:base-testnet && oasis rofl update --deployment base-testnet
scripts.rofl:create:mainnet: oasis rofl create --network mainnet --deployment mainnet --account YOUR_MAINNET_ACCOUNT
scripts.rofl:build:mainnet: cp compose.mainnet.yaml compose.yaml && docker run --platform linux/amd64 --volume "$(pwd)":/src --volume ~/.docker:/root/.docker:ro -it ghcr.io/oasisprotocol/rofl-dev:main oasis rofl build --deployment mainnet
scripts.rofl:update:mainnet: npm run rofl:set:mainnet && oasis rofl update --deployment mainnet
scripts.rofl:create:base-mainnet: oasis rofl create --network mainnet --deployment base-mainnet --account YOUR_MAINNET_ACCOUNT
scripts.rofl:build:base-mainnet: cp compose.base-mainnet.yaml compose.yaml && docker run --platform linux/amd64 --volume "$(pwd)":/src --volume ~/.docker:/root/.docker:ro -it ghcr.io/oasisprotocol/rofl-dev:main oasis rofl build --deployment base-mainnet
scripts.rofl:update:base-mainnet: npm run rofl:set:base-mainnet && oasis rofl update --deployment base-mainnet

author: Tradable
